mapper.select: select month,sum,leastOnce atLeastOne,never noDeal,liveSum liveness from res_funnel where month=#{month}
select month from res_funnel order by month desc

select DATE_FORMAT(day,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(day,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(day,'%Y') as month,sum(drainNum) drainNum,sum(drainNum)/(allNum) other
from res_vipDrain
where day between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by 1 asc
